Xpos587 Apps Repository

Curated collection of high-quality Android applications. Features official binaries from trusted developers, including privacy tools, communication apps, open-source alternatives, and useful utilities. Covers both FOSS and proprietary applications for enhanced mobile experience.

Currently it serves 4 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Xpos587/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
